alert.note: Alert for Eastern Box Elder County; Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 3:57PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Box Elder County through 430 PM MDT... At 357 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles northwest of Great Salt Lake North of the Causeway, or 35 miles south of Snowville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Corinne, Howell, Great Salt Lake North of the Causeway, Elwood, Locomotive Springs, Promontory, Penrose, Lakeside, Thatcher, Gunnison Island and Golden Spike Historic Site. This storm will be capable of producing strong gusty winds on the Great Salt Lake. This will lead to a sudden increase in waves and very choppy waters which will result in hazardous boating conditions. Boaters are urged to seek safe harbor if possible. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Box Elder County; Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains
